354350.name: This War of Mine Original Soundtrack
354350.description:
音乐在烘托《This War of Mine》的昏暗气氛上有着重要作用。由屡谱经典的Piotr Musiał与工作室程序员Grzegorz Mazur所创作的音乐将带你回味游玩游戏故事时那些最令人难忘的时刻。三种格式供你选择（flac、mp3以及wav）。原声碟最终版共包含16首音轨。

Complete track list:

  • This War of Mine
  • Some Place We Called Home
  • When The Night Comes
  • These Cold Days
  • No Good Choice
  • We Keep Going
  • Things Right and Wrong
  • Monday Cigarette
  • Time Is Running Out
  • The Last Goodbye
  • Thaw
  • Tuned To Live
  • Alone
  • Still Alive Inside
  • A girl from Pogoren
  • Never Forget
354350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
